pros: Has a bind with Armageddon (Hyper Skill)
Good link skill (provides %Ignore DEF, good for bossing)
Simple class that has dedicated bossing and mobbing attacks
cons: Weak teleport skill but becomes incredible while in Equilibrium mode
Has lots of active buffs to manage

• Reflection - Range Up

extraContent.title: Equilibrium
extraContent.content:
Luminous has two different types of skills, Light and Dark magic. In addition, they have two main modes indicated by a gauge which boosts the effects of their Light and Dark magic

When in Light mode, your Light skills deal additional hits per attack and restore some %Max HP. As you keep using Light skills, you eventually enter into Dark mode

When in Dark mode, your Dark skills deal additional hits per attack and cost 0 MP. As you keep using Dark skills, you eventually enter into Light mode

As well, Luminous has a middle state called Equilibrium unlocked in 3rd Job where you gain the effects of both Light and Dark mode and are also able to use Equilibrium skills with no cooldowns. This occurs whenever you switch between Light and Dark modes

Light and Dark Affinity (1st Job)

Based on a choice you make, you can choose between Light or Dark magic. There is little difference except for a passive %Final Damage boost to either your Light or Dark magic. If you skip the beginning cutscenes, you will automatically receive Dark Affinity

In 4th Job, you will gain a special skill called The Crossroads of Destiny that allows you to switch between Light and Dark Affinity but has a long cooldown

primary.name: Sunfire
primary.shortDesc: Light skills deal an additional hit dealing 50% of Final Damage and restoring 1% of your base HP per cast.

primary.name: Eclipse
primary.shortDesc: Dark skills deal an additional hit proportional to the number of attacks that is 50% of final damage and use 0 MP.
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

primary.name: Equilibrium
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance +100% for 10 sec. When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting 50% of Final Damage for each hit. When Equilibrium is active, delivers an additional attack inflicting 100% of Final Damage for each hit. Ignores all cooldowns. Dark spells cost 0 MP. Light spells restore 1% of HP.\nThe total number of hits cannot exceed 15 for both Light and Dark attacks.
primary.desc: While in Equilibrium mode, you take only 1 HP damage from enemy attacks and gain 100% Knockback Resistance
details:
Additionally, you gain both the effects of and
  • Equilibrium skills also deal additional hits per attack

primary.name: Inner Light
primary.shortDesc: Willpower Lv. 20, Insight Lv. 20, INT +20 , more MP increased from leveling, permanent immunity to the Darkness status.

primary.name: Flash Blink
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Teleport to a random location on the field.
primary.desc: Teleports to a random location on the map
details: If there is an enemy nearby, you will teleport to the nearest enemy

primary.name: Flash Shower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 280%.
primary.desc: Shoots out a projectile forward that passes through enemies

primary.name: Abyssal Drop
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage: 107%.
primary.desc: Summons several crystals that drop in front of you

primary.name: Light Speed
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Teleport left/right 170 and up/down 320. Become invulnerable to physical attacks for a short time after teleport. You will not become invulnerable unless you actually move.\n[Passive Effect: +20 Movement Speed and +10 Jump]
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: [Passive]: Increases Movement Speed and Jump
You are briefly invincible to touch damage after teleporting
Can also be used on ladders to move to platforms above and below you
While in Equilibrium mode, you can teleport in the air

primary.name: Standard Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: 85% of damage affects MP instead of HP. If your MP reaches 0, your HP takes full damage.\n[Passive Effect: +150 Defense.]

primary.name: Mana Well
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +30%

primary.name: Light Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Increase light magic's final damage by 5%
details: You will receive either the Light or Dark version depending on your decision

primary.name: Dark Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Increase dark magic's final damage by 5%
details: You will receive either the Light or Dark version depending on your decision

primary.name: Sylvan Lance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 115%, Number of Attacks: 4.
primary.desc: Fires several homing spears forward

primary.name: Blinding Pillar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Distance: 350, Knockback Chance: 100%.
primary.desc: Creates pillars of light around you that pushes enemies back and has a chance to stun

primary.name: Pressure Void
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 1, Damage: 168%. Steer by holding the skill key and using Left Arrow Key,Right Arrow Key. Maximum range of 350 to the left and right.
primary.desc: Creates an orb that damages nearby enemies
details: Can be directed by pressing the Left or Right Arrow Keys

primary.name: Black Blessing
primary.shortDesc:
Creates a dark orb to protect you from all attacks for 3 sec. If you take damage, one orb of darkness will break and absorb 70% of damage.
[Boost to Magic Attack when orbs are accumulated]
1 orb: +15 Magic Attack
2 orbs: +24 Magic Attack
3 orbs: +30 Magic Attack
primary.desc: Periodically while in combat, creates orbs around you that absorb a portion of damage taken
details: Based on how many orbs you have active, you gain increased Magic Attack (max 3 orbs)

primary.name: Magic Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10, Damage: +15%, Critical Rate: +20%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: Spectral Light
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 20. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 121%, Number of Attacks: 4. Steer the beams by holding the skill key and pressing Up or Down.
primary.desc: Fires a controllable beam of light
details: Can be directed by pressing the Up or Down Arrow Keys
Pressing Left or Right will change the direction you fire

primary.name: Ray of Redemption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Recovery: 800%\n[Cooldown: 5 sec]
primary.desc: Shines a beam of light in front of you that damages enemies and heals nearby party members

primary.name: Moonlight Spear
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 371%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Launches spears beneath nearby enemies

primary.name: Death Scythe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Cooldown: 24 sec]
primary.desc: Summons two reapers from opposite sides that dash towards each other
details: While in Equilibrium mode, skill has no cooldown

primary.name: Shadow Shell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Ignore debilitating status conditions 3 times. Cooldown: 300 sec when broken.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Elemental Resistance by 40% and Abnormal Status Resistance by 40]
primary.desc: Creates a shell that blocks up to 3 Abnormal Statuses
details: [Passive]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Dusk Guard
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +300, Damage Ignored: 20%
primary.desc: Grants flat DEF and a chance to ignore an enemy attack

primary.name: Photic Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55. Duration: 180 sec. Increases you and your party members' Magic ATT by 40.

primary.name: Lunar Tide
primary.shortDesc: Restores your HP or MP, whichever is proportionally lower, by 2.0% of its maximum value at set intervals

primary.name: The Crossroads of Destiny
primary.shortDesc: Cooldown: 6hrs
primary.desc: Allows you to swap between Light Affinity and Dark Affinity

primary.name: Reflection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 81, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Emits a beam of light that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Damage is reduced per each bounce of the beam

primary.name: Morning Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Knockback Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 2, Explosion Damage: 370%\n[Cooldown: 5 sec]\n[Passive Effect: Final Damage +30%]
primary.desc: Summons a meteor that pushes enemies back
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Apocalypse
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 340%.
primary.desc: Unleashes a burst of void energy in front of you

primary.name: Ender
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 49, Max Enemies Hit: 2. Damage: 385%, Number of Attacks: 7\nAdditional Critical rate: 100%, Additional DEF ignored: 40%\n[Cooldown: 12 sec]
primary.desc: Deals a devastating attack to up to 2 enemies
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
While in Equilibrium mode, skill has no cooldown

primary.name: Dark Crescendo
primary.shortDesc: When direct skill attacks hit, there is a 80% chance to increase damage by 4% for 20 secs. Can stack up to 10 times
primary.desc: When your attacks hit an enemy, there is a chance to gain a stacking %Damage buff

primary.name: Arcane Pitch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 85, Ignored Monster Elemental Resistance 10%, Duration: 180 sec\n[Passive: Final damage +40%, ignores 40% of defense rate]

primary.name: Magic Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Magic ATT: +30, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants Magic Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Darkness Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Equilibrium Duration: +7 sec. Time to reach Sunfire and Eclipse decreases when light or dark skills are used.\nCan use Light Speed once vertically (up-down) and once horizontally (left-right) in the air while Equilibrium is active\nDeath Scythe Damage: +100%
primary.desc: Increases the duration of Equilibrium mode and decreases amount of skills required to reach Light mode and Dark mode
details: While in Equilibrium mode, you can use in the air
Additionally increases %Damage of

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

hyperPassive.name: Reflection - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases split damage reduction rate to 0%.

hyperActive.name: Equalize
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Equilibrium status begins.\nCooldown: 150 sec

hyperActive.name: Armageddon
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 3, Stun Duration: 10 sec, Invincible while casting.\nStun Duration: up to +100% depending on damage inflicted with Armageddon.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a massive explosion that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Gate of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 10
When attacking one enemy: 750%
Duration: 37 sec
Can be used once while Equilibrium is active
fifthMain.desc: Summons a gate that damages nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage if only attacking one enemy
Can only be used only once while in Equilibrium mode
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Aether Conduit
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 6 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10
Sunfire - Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 4
Eclipse - Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 5
Equilibrium - Damage: 665%, Number of Attacks: 6
Critical Rate: +15% to all attacks
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a magic symbol that fires a stream of magic arrows
details: The attack differs depending on the state you are currently in
While the summon is active, increases %Crit Rate
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Baptism of Light and Darkness
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 2000, activates the Baptism of Light and Darkness 13 times consecutively. Damage: 750%, Number of Attacks: 7
Additional Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 45 sec
If the Ender hits the enemy, you gain 1 Sword of Consciousness. If you acquire 12 swords, the cooldown for Baptism of Light and Darkness resets immediately.
fifthMain.desc: Creates several swords that strike down on one enemy
details: Attack has increased %100 Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
If hits an enemy, you gain a stack of 'Sword of Consciousness' and at 12 stacks, the cooldown for resets immediately
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Liberation Orb
fifthMain.shortDesc: [Passive Effect]: Damage: 750%, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 6 sec, obtain up to 4 magic power per attribute. Light: creates up to 1 light zone(s) that attack up to 3 enemies. Darkness: fires magic bullets that move back and forth across up to 7 enemies.\n[Active Effect]: MP Cost: 1200, Cooldown: 180 sec\nDuration: 45 sec, direct skill attacks that create 10 magic orbs, each of which attack 1 enemy, attack activates up to 20 times. Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Damage increases by 50%p for each unit of accumulated magic power beyond the first. Cooldown: 1 sec. Imbalance: creates a magic orb that deals 975% damage. Balance: creates a magic orb that deals 1000% damage.
details:
[Passive]: When using an attack that matches the current state you are in, there is a chance for a special attack to trigger
  • []: Using a Light attack has a chance to create a burst of light near you that damages enemies
  • []: Using a Dark attack has a chance to create a projectile that bounces to multiple enemies
  • Each triggered attack will accumulate 1 'Magic Power' which is used for the Active effect
    • Magic Power accumulated in are separate from those obtained in
    • Up to 4 Magic Power can be accumulated for both states
    • They also do not disappear until the Active effect is used
    • Magic Power cannot be accumulated in

[Active]: Summons a magic orb that launches homing orbs at a single enemy each time you attack
  • Based on the Magic Power accumulated, if the amount on both sides are equal, the attack will deal increased %Damage and is considered Balanced, else it is Unbalanced
  • For each Magic Power accumulated, the %Damage of the orbs will be increased
  • Attack will target bosses and enemies with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

notable.name: Baptsim of Light and Darkness - 5th Job

meta: Luminous is an INT mage class part of the Heroes class group. What is unique about Luminous is their ability to control both Light and Dark magic. The strength of Luminous' magic will shift between Light and Dark thus requiring you to alternate between both
